gpu.gpuRentalDescription: Here you can rent gaming PCs from nearby internet cafes and individuals. Once connected, you can play all platform-supported games. Short rental periods and quick startup make it perfect for instant gaming. You can rent by the hour and remotely access gaming PCs to directly play popular whitelisted games (e.g. PUBG, GTA5). Note: Devices are for gaming only - other uses are currently unsupported.
gpu.title: Notice
gpu.description: Here, you can rent gaming computers shared by individuals and immediately enjoy games supported by the platform once you enter. Rentals are short-term and quick to start, making them ideal for gaming anytime. You can rent by the hour and remotely access the gaming PC to directly play popular games on the platform’s whitelist (such as PUBG, GTA5, etc.). Note: These computers are strictly for gaming purposes and do not currently support other uses. If the machine is more than 500 kilometers away, game latency may significantly increase. Please pay attention when selecting the distance. The default distance is 500 KM.
gpu.distanceWarning: If the machine is more than 500 kilometers away, game latency may significantly increase. Please pay attention when selecting.
gpu.noGPUData: No data under this GPU type
gpu.description2: Rent shared gaming PCs from internet cafes to enjoy supported games and the same privileges. The price is higher due to included game benefits.
gpu.game_tip: After renting a machine and entering the desktop, you can scan the Steam QR code to play PC games. Note: If the machine is over 500 km away, game latency may increase significantly. Please choose your machine carefully.
gpu.noGpuMachinesHere: No GPU machines available in this area
gpu.tips: The machine is more than 500 km away, which will significantly increase game latency. Please choose carefully.

setting.disableMouseTip: When enabled, mouse will be unavailable when using the virtual joystick.
setting.autoJoystickTip: When enabled, the joystick will show automatically when needed.

IsWallet.walletNftAccessTip: Once you connect your wallet, you can unlock exclusive NFT features and explore more experiences.
IsWallet.walletBuyTokensTip: Once you connect your wallet, you can view information related to DeepBrainChain Coin and DeepLink Coin.
IsWallet.walletPurchaseServicesTip: Once you connect your wallet, you can use tokens to activate cloud gaming and other platform features.
IsWallet.walletClaimRewardsTip: Once you connect your wallet, you can access DeepLink Coin benefits related to platform activities.
IsWallet.walletShareGpuTip: Once you connect your wallet, you can join the distributed computing network and share your GPU (Nvidia 20 series or higher is required).

createWallet.walletPasswordReminder: You must remember your password! You must not lose it, you need your password and your private key to open your wallet.
createWallet.walletPasswordRule: At least 8 characters with letters and numbers

walletSuccess.privateKeyStorageTip: Store your private key file in a safe place. Write it down with pen and paper and keep the piece of paper in a safe place.
walletSuccess.doNotLoseIt: Do not lose it! If you lose it, it is not recoverable.
walletSuccess.doNotSendIt: Do not send it on social media or communication software such as WeChat, QQ, Facebook, Line, KakaoTalk, WhatsApp. If you use this document on a malicious phishing website, your asset
walletSuccess.backupReminder: You must back up your file! Treat it as if it will one day be worth millions.

openWallet.walletPasswordReminder: You must remember your password! You must not lose it, you need your password and your private key to open your wallet.
openWallet.invalidPrivateKey: Please enter a valid 64-character hexadecimal private key
openWallet.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters
openWallet.passwordAlphaNumeric: Password must contain both letters and numbers

shareGpu.shareToEarn: By sharing my computer, I can earn DLC rewards online.
shareGpu.earnWithoutRenting: With this sharing method, you can earn rewards even if your computer is not rented out.
shareGpu.hardwareRequirement: Requirement: GPU must be NVIDIA 20 series or higher, with at least 16GB of RAM.
shareGpu.rewardExample: Example: Based on current DLC prices, a device with RTX 4070 GPU and 32GB RAM can earn up to $2,921 in monthly online rewards.
shareGpu.rentBonus: If the device is rented out, rewards will increase by an additional $3,096.
shareGpu.rentalHoursNote: Calculated based on 12 hours of rental per day.
shareGpu.electricityCost: Monthly electricity cost is approximately $4 to $8.
shareGpu.nftDescription: After owning a Mining Node NFT, you can rent out your computer to earn DLC rewards, with each NFT also granting an additional 30,000 DLC airdrop reward.
shareGpu.competitionDescription: Currently, NFT holders can participate in the Orion Short-Term Rental Incentive Competition, lasting 6 months with a total reward pool of 1 billion DLC.
shareGpu.earn_rental_income: Earn rental income by sharing your computer.
shareGpu.requirements: Requirements: NVIDIA 20 series or higher GPU, minimum 16GB RAM.
shareGpu.sharing_method: With this sharing method, no node NFT or DBC staking is required, but there are no fixed rewards—you only receive payment when your computer is rented.
shareGpu.example: Example: A machine with RTX 4070 GPU and 32GB RAM earns hourly rental income of: $0.1668
shareGpu.feature_development: This feature is under development, stay tuned!
shareGpu.deeplink_notice: Sharing machines in the internet cafe mode requires DeepLink official review and approval before going online. Please fill in the information accurately.
shareGpu.verification_code_sent: Verification code has been sent to your email
shareGpu.rules_rental_bonus: When the machine is rented, the reward increases by 30%
shareGpu.gpu_requirements: Restricted to GPUs of Nvidia 20 series or higher, with memory of 16GB or more
shareGpu.staking_requirements: Each machine must stake 1000 DBC fixedly, while DLC can stake any amount; the more staked, the higher the reward. Reference:
shareGpu.nft_staking_requirements: Each machine must stake at least 1 mining node NFT, up to 20 NFTs. Staking 20 NFTs yields 20 times the reward of 1 NFT. Purchase NFTs:
shareGpu.pre_rental_warning: You must complete these 3 steps before renting out your computer: (Failure to strictly follow these steps may lead to data breaches or system issues, and the renter is solely responsible!)
shareGpu.delete_personal_files: 1. Thoroughly delete all personal files (photos/documents/account passwords, etc.) to prevent privacy leaks!
shareGpu.install_steam: 2. Install Steam software (mandatory, otherwise the machine cannot receive rewards)
shareGpu.install_games: 3. Pre-install at least 3 popular AAA games, such as: Red Dead Redemption 2, Grand Theft Auto V, Black Myth: Wukong, Elden Ring, Grand Theft Auto VI, Assassin’s Creed Odyssey, Cyberpunk 2077, God of War: Ragnarök, Hogwarts Legacy
shareGpu.machine_list_refresh: The current machine list refreshes every 10 minutes. If there are no changes in the data, you can manually refresh to check.

transaction.allLoaded: All transaction records have been loaded

errors.alreadyKnown: Transaction already submitted. Please check confirmation later.
errors.insufficientDbc: Not enough gas (DBC). Please top up and try again.
errors.nonceTooLow: Nonce too low. Please retry later or clear pending transactions.
errors.feeTooLow: Fee too low. Consider increasing it and retry.
errors.gasUnderpriced: Gas price too low. Consider increasing it and retry.
errors.timeout: Timed out waiting for on-chain confirmation. Check the record later.
errors.genericTxFailed: Transaction failed. Please try again later.
